website_summaries.verdict: This affordable magnifier devotes two LED lights to the main 3X lens and a third to the super close-up 45X lens.
pros: Lightweight and suited for indoor or outdoor use, with an ergonomic handle that houses the smaller lens
cons: Some issues with the light button sticking have been reported

customer_reviews.title: broken already
customer_reviews.text: I'm sorry but the switch for the light doesn't work broke pretty much after I received it. I need the light to see items well. Maybe this isn't typical but I'm disappointed. Bummer could have been a great tool
customer_reviews.author: John Fly

customer_reviews.title: bad light switch
customer_reviews.text: I had the same problem with the light switch as some of the others here. It either stays on or won't turn on depending on the switch being a cheap part. Don't buy this if you need the light!
customer_reviews.author: Randall K. Watters

customer_reviews.title: While this magnifier works good on the large lens
customer_reviews.text: While this magnifier works good on the large lens, the switch that turns on and off the three digital lights is damn near worthless. Time after time I need to check to make sure the lights are off due to the deficient switch that comes with it... One time i left it and returned home after 5 hours at work and found it still ON!!!!!! After I had hit the button to turn it off....??????????? Sorry but after really playing with it to make sure it's off, I've decided that in addition to buying a large number of AAA batteries, I also need to buy a different one in the future....
customer_reviews.author: Diamond999

customer_reviews.title: Such a great 3 LED Magnifier Light, I keep buying more!
customer_reviews.text: This 3 LED Magnifier Light has been/is such a great product! It comes bubble wrapped enclosed within the attractive product package, attractive even for a nice gift many could use. 1st was purchased for in-office, one to keep in night-stand, and a third to keep in the car. Whether you have a sliver to see magnified, or you're enjoying detailed crafts, or you're mastering your senior years with occasionally needing assistance on fine print - THIS is your magnifier. The light is very effective as well for additional visual assistance/lighting. Insert three "AAA" batteries and enjoy a brighter life! :-) Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Mine has several issures
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier appeared to be a perfect fit but it is a disappointment. The led lights are only a small illumination of the magnification of the large area and the small lens for magnification magnifies in a reverse as in a mirror reflection "strange", try reading print in reverse and upside down and you will understand. It is as if the lens is put in backwards, but I can't see how to reverse it. The light will turn on ok but to turn it off is not so easy and sometimes requires removing the batteries. I am returning this and buying another with many more led lights to give a better light coverage.
customer_reviews.author: W. J.

customer_reviews.title: 2ND BUY EXTREME DISAPPPOINTMENT WASTED MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The first Marrywindix 3X 45X Handheld Magnifier I bought over a year ago is so excellent—sharp, clear quality—that I recently bought a second one. I have macular degneration and rely on magnifiers. The second one looks idential to the first one, excellent quality plastic and design, but the lens quality is awful. It’s foggy as a cheap Walmart magnifier I have which strains the eyes. Not crisp and clear as the first Marrywindix I bought, like looking through clean glass not cloudy plastic.. I tossed the box and packaging away not expecting to return it, so it was wasted money on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Fine Magnification
customer_reviews.text: These magnifying glasses are worth their weight in gold. Three AAA batteries create a light bright enough to use as a flashlight and the magnification is profound. No map detail or medication bottle instructions can escape me now. The smaller lens is like a jeweler's loupe and must be held steadily to focus properly. NOTE: When you lay it down on the light power button, it'll come on, and if you are in a lighted room, you won't notice it. I don't think it has an automatic time out feature. Arrived in a flimsy cardboard box with English and Chinese instructions, but came promptly. I wouldn't spend a bunch more money hoping to find something better than this item.
customer_reviews.author: Layton P.Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: You can't be without this precious tool.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS TOOL! I keep this in my kitchen desk drawer and pull it out several times a day. You can read the really fine print on food packets, etc. and especially the "fine print" they want you to miss! And those pesky bar codes they put on computer equipment (the serial number of a printer, router, etc.) It is just a can't do without tool. Remember that sliver you got from the deck railing? No problem--the light in the magnifier will pick it up so you can pick it out! Every household should have one. It is nice quality and is balanced nicely to fit in your hand. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Elder

customer_reviews.title: I put fresh batteries in this upon arrival less than ...
customer_reviews.text: I put fresh batteries in this upon arrival less than 6 months ago. Used the device 4-5 times. The magnifier fried the batteries, leaking all over and now does not work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to fix by moving the button forward
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but there is an issue where if you press the light button down it may get stuck under the plastic handle. It's easy to fix by moving the button forward, but when there is an elderly person using this item, it may be an issue. Bottom line: The light switch button can get stuck under the plastic handle button opening. If the person using the item doesn't realize the fix is to push the button forward to release, the batteries may burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Thiggy

customer_reviews.title: worthless and misleading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magnifier because on the description it says 3x45 magnifying. I thought it was the whole lens. But that magnifying is only the little penny size lens. The big one is magnifying but almost worthless. You can use your phone and zoom in and you get better description. If you are thinking you are getting the 3x45 is misleading to customers because it only applies to the penny size lens. Also the big lens it seems plastic and very hard to get a clear view and mine was dirty and scratched. Going back.
customer_reviews.author: wa254

customer_reviews.title: This is a toy, not an option for people ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy, not an option for people with macular degeneration. The only legible words lie in the dead center of the lens, and the rest are distorted. The 15x lens produces an upside-down image. The lights work for a day or two. Don't believe the fake reviews. Also, It's plastic. Magnifying glass my a**
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have eye disorders
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for an older coworker of mine. She had a magnifying glass that she loved but it kept falling apart. She had a degenerative and RARE eye disease that causes her eye sight to get worse every 6 weeks. She LOVES this magnifying glass. It has helped her so much and is really compatible for her eyes. Now she doesn't have to go through the literal headache of eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekka Shrum

customer_reviews.title: On/Off Switch does NOT WORK! - Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to receiving this product and use the light feature. I have 2 other magnifiers w/o lights. I just received it, unfortunately the on/off switch does NOT works. After inserting the batteries the lights turn on, but the switch does not work. In order to turn it off, I have the remove a battery (or insert the batteries again to turn it back on). I am far too busy to return the product and I already have 2 magnifies without lights! I am pretty upset!
customer_reviews.author: Tom D

customer_reviews.title: Small magnifying glass with a 3 LED Light works well for reading small written information and numbers.
customer_reviews.text: This 3 LED Light magnifying glass was my favorite item on my wish list at Christmas. I have a difficult time reading small writing on directions, phone books, and information on products even though I wear glasses. It magnifies the right strength, 3X 15X, for me and I really like the light as it turns on and off. The magnifying glass is not too big nor is it too heavy. The handle is easy to hold. I am really pleased with this magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne g. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective Tool
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made recently. It has helped me on numerous occasions since I bought it a few months ago. Everything from reading watch battery numbers to extra fine print on documents. The LED light takes a little getting used to because it throws some shadows that can make it difficult in some situations but overall, a great little tool for older eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome LED magnifying glass!
customer_reviews.text: Great for so many uses, but I bought this for my little guy who fancies himself a bit of a "bug hunter". He enjoys turning over rocks, and investigating what he finds. This lighted magnifier has brought a whole new element to that, for him! I would recommend this because: 1. It has already withstood the machinations of a very active 6.5 year old boy, playing outside and inside. 2. It only takes 3 AAA batteries, and heavy use for the past few days has not seen them die out yet, so that pleases me. 3. Compact. 4. Very bright LED's, but not blinding. I know that we will be peering at many, many new discoveries in the future!
customer_reviews.author: CROCHET QUEEN

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Have one in each room.
customer_reviews.text: We have one in the kitchen, one in the living room, one in bedroom, one in my office. If your eyes are getting fuzzier with age, get these. If you have them in each room, it's much easier to find than reading glasses for a quick scan of directions or ingredients. Last a long time between battery changes. Also pretty resistant to bumps. Tip: find a place in each room to keep them and keep them in that spot always. Easier to find quickly that way.
customer_reviews.author: Master of Cats

customer_reviews.title: Marrywindix 3 LED Light 3X 15X Handheld
customer_reviews.text: My co-worker and I are having trouble reading smaller and smaller print. I'm sure it has nothing to do with our age. So I ordered this and shipping was fast, it was nicely packaged and had easy instructions for the LED. The light works really well and has been a very nice feature. It's a little hard to see exactly what you want through the little magnifier in the handle but I found that if I just lay it down on the paper that i'm trying to read it works pretty well. Overall, although i'm not too happy that I need a magnifying glass, this one has worked really well for us and i'm very glad that we have it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful and to be clear, it's only ONE mag glass with the 45x in the handle
customer_reviews.text: Not very useful...first, just so you know (because I found the description wasn't clear) this is ONE magnifying glass that is 3x. The 45X is that teeeeeeny little circle in the handle. Which is basically useless...can't even get it close enough to something to see it. And a 3x mag glass isn't all that helpful...heck you can get 3x readers, so why bother? I'd have sent it back but it wasn't worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Healer

customer_reviews.title: great for older eyes, even with glasses!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great magnifier. I got it as my old one was so scratched up and had the little circle of higher magnification inside the larger circle. I love that the 2 different powers are separated so that I can take full advantage of the complete area of the circle. I mainly use mine while playing hidden object games on my Kindle. I'm sure it will also be very helpful with my stamp collecting along with the lights. don't need the light feature for the games. and I love the magnification power of the big lens. wow, it's great for older eyes, even with glasses!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A. Stamp

customer_reviews.title: I like this, very useful, and it illuminates well.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy it uses regular batteries and not those button types. If I could change one thing it would be the location and type of button. I would change the button, in this location, to a momentary contact type, because it's too easy to turn on when not intending to in basic handling. Alternatively the button could be left as this type, just relocated to some other place. Since the molds for this product already exist the cheapest thing is the change the internal button to be a momentary contact. That way it's never turned on accidentally and left on.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleuthing in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: I love the construction. The plastic is smooth and feels nice n' comfy in your hand. Button for the LED light button can easily be pressed with your thumb. You can place it on any surface without having to worry about scratching the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed in this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this! My husband and I find ENDLESS uses for this awesome product. We keep it prominently in place in the living room because we are always using it! Its great for sewing, looking at labels, looking at found coins and such and 100 other uses. The battery pack is very well designed unlike many compact and crappy pieces and it's affordable!
customer_reviews.author: M'ette

customer_reviews.title: Light is not as helpful as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I was just a little disappointed because I can't get the light to shine the direction I want it to. I'd like for it to shine a little more upward to where the magnifier shines. Instead the light shines just below the magnifier and isn't adjustable. It's ok if you don't need the light, but if you do, I'd look for one with better light placement. I do use it, just not as much as I expected to, because of the ease of use with the light. But the magnifier works great.
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use only.
customer_reviews.text: It is OK. The optics aren't great. There is a very noticeable lens distortion It makes it very difficult to read anything with it. There is a blue tint to the glass. The tiny lens in the handle is a wast of space. It is useless, the focal length is much to short . The only nice thing about it is that the LED lights work great.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, can be improved
customer_reviews.text: The main view is very clear, and I really like the LED lighting. The smaller view is too small, and it gets blurry if you are moving at all. You have to be absolutely motionless and perfect half inch distance from object for it to get a clear view.
customer_reviews.author: MaxHrv

customer_reviews.title: Great for tackling jobs that need a little enlarging!
customer_reviews.text: I change a lot of watch batteries for myself and my family. As my eyesight isn’t what it used to be, this magnifying glass with light is my new inexpensive “assistant.” It takes a little getting used to to find the right distance to get the clearest view. But it definitely was a good buy for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: sunshan

customer_reviews.title: Best around anywhere. Price not Ada toe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this glass. It has the most perfect lights. It is often the light I need more than the magnification. I have bought others but they do not come close to this. I own three that I keep in different rooms. I have also bought several for friends who also have visual problems. They too, love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: phl

customer_reviews.title: If it was only a rectangle ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Feels solid in hand. Lens is okay, but now I know why magnifiers come in a rectangular shape. In order to see the objective with both eyes, you must hold the magnifier at just the right distance, and that can be a bit tricky. I keep it in the garage for when I need to read tiny instructions and I don't have my glasses. For more frequent use, either a larger lens or one with a rectangular shape would be easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great glass, the high-mag feature is as good as my hand lens for identifying minerals and looking for flaws in jewelry. The low mag is great for reading the fine print designed to keep old people from knowing what is in their meds. Quality is great and it is very sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: John T. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Avoid and Get Unlit Rectangular Lens
customer_reviews.text: Distorts image around the edges and the center isn't very clear. The LEDs produce more glare than light. I bought one of these and wish I had returned it. My preference is a large, rectangular, non-LED magnifier. These can be found on Amazon.com. Originally had one provided when I bought the small print version of the Oxford English Dictionary (OED)...an eye test if ever there was one!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kid perspective
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnifying glass. It is powerful, the light is bright and in a good spot. This would be perfect for reading or looking at small details close up. I got it for my daughter who is six. She tends to try to look at things farther away like she can with the magnifying glasses they have at school. If you buy this for the younger ones just be aware you will have to remind them to move closer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: nearsighted/farsighted
customer_reviews.text: I am nearsighted and although I need a magnifying glass occasionally, my husband and my brother who are both farsighted need one daily and the light is essential to their happiness. They carry this glass with them daily and pull it out at least a dozen times a day to help them see small things...not only writing but stuff growing under their toenails and whether or not the dog needs wormed again...the 15X is particularly useful in these respects. I would recommend this useful item.
customer_reviews.author: Janto2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the man who "Doesn't need reading glasses"
customer_reviews.text: My husband can see just fine, thank you very much. That being said, it is so weird how hard it is to read words in dim light. Although my husband was taken aback to find this item in his Christmas stocking last year, he has made much use of it in the past year. This handy magnifying glass with built in light at the press of a button has been invaluable for many purposes: reading a medication bottle, playing trivia card games in the living room where the lighting is not the best for reading tiny words on the cards, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bozarth

customer_reviews.title: Boy do you go through batteries.
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok magnifying glass.BUT !!! boy do you go through batteries.It takes 3 AAA and wife uses it to read the newspaper and has to change batteries every week.Also the light gets weaker in a few days.Also I wish the glass was just a little bigger ,like 1" it would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: hp1480

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful as a magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: The large glass was OK but not that useful for me... not great optics. The small glass had such poor optics that I couldn't use it, and I bought it for that specific magnification. Good idea, but it didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Confusing magnification spec.
customer_reviews.text: I expect this product to have 5x and 20x magnification (as advertised). However nowhere can I see a clear spec either on the box or on the manual. I do see the following words on the box, SIZES: 45x22mm 3x75mm. If it means what I think it means, these would be 3x and 45x magnification, which is totally different than what is advertised. I wonder whether I should return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it’s a good product but the light flickers on and off due ...
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because the package was sealed but the package has been opened. The plastic bag bagged by the makers was torn and the magnifying glass was tampered and somebody had already placed the batteries in it. Otherwise it’s a good product but the light flickers on and off due to the batteries are not sealed tightly inside the battery compartment because it looks like whoever placed the batteries roughed the supporting springs. Why would anyone want to do this? I don’t know but two stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Detrick Jones

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Value for Casual Use
customer_reviews.text: I does magnify and there is LED lighting. The visual clarity of the glass is not perfect. But then it’s a cost effective toll for casual use. If your use is small scale jewelry or craft work, I would not recommend it. But need to read some small print or serial number or size stamping on a tool, this is a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good magnifier for most things
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier works well, but the light isn't very helpful. It doesn't light the entire area so I have to fiddle with it to get the light to illuminate what I'm looking at. The handle is very comfortable. The whole magnifier feels very sturdy in my hand without being heavy. If you have an additional light source this is a good magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Matilda

customer_reviews.title: Light switch unreliable
customer_reviews.text: The price is a bargain, because the switch is cheap quality. I bought two, one for my mother and one for myself. Both have problems with the light switch. Sometimes you can't turn the light on, repeatedly clicking the button, but nothing happens. Until you get "lucky". Other times it is getting the light to turn off. A hard-to-switch light is *no* bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Firstrock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this magnifying glass, it has a lovely light and is compact enough for a perfect fit for what I need. I could not be more happy with it. Just a couple dimensions, from the bottom to the top is 7 and 3/4" and the glass part of the magnifier, not the outer edge but just the glass part is 2 and 3/4" diameter. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland Gentleman

customer_reviews.title: This magnifier is my best friend. I purchased two for the house
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is my best friend. I purchased two for the house. Purchased one for a Christmas gift and recently purchased another one for our vehicle to use when we take road trips -- reading maps without it difficult. GREAT GIFT FOR ANYONE WHO HAS TROUBLE READING SMALLER PRINT TYPES.
customer_reviews.author: RACER

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy This Now!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifying glass is perfect! A large enough magnifying area so that you get a good look, an ergonomic handle that fits your hand perfectly, fabulous lights and lightweight. So glad I bought this for all those teeny tiny directions and ingredients labels.
customer_reviews.author: Selene

customer_reviews.title: the lights will not turn off.
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 weeks of use the lights will not go off . When I push the switch to turn off , it will go to dim light and will not go off.
customer_reviews.author: hiroko

customer_reviews.title: Works great and makes a great gift too!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this magnifier so much, I bought another to give my friend Judy as a gift. I bought mine to read small print on labels, directions for products, etc. Judy is an Antique Expert. I laughed when she brought out her "loop" jewelry magnifier to see a signature on a piece of vintage artwork. So I purchased a 2nd magnifier for her. The light works wonderfully! The handle is light, feels good, and is easy to grip if you have arthritis or other hand issues. I'm very happy with this purchase and special gift for my dear friend.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Faith BBE, CTM, NE

customer_reviews.title: Light is very useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnifier for working on electronics projects. The light is extremely useful. The small magnifier in the handle lets me read very fine details on components. I bought two and they have both been handy, keeping them in separate locations.
customer_reviews.author: VaughnFromUtah

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly as described on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. Higher quality than I expected & performs well. I gave it 4 stars vs 5 stars as I later purchased a similar product than I liked better. The similar item performs as well but I received 3 in a pack for a similar price. Performance wise both are about the same.
customer_reviews.author: DW Huntsville AL

customer_reviews.title: Big Help
customer_reviews.text: father-in-law has macular degeneration and cannot see very well. He uses the lights on here and with magnification, can make out the words.
customer_reviews.author: Rena M.

customer_reviews.title: The light is a perfect brightness for what I need to use this for ...
customer_reviews.text: As you get older, you will understand why I appreciate this magnifying glass. The light is a perfect brightness for what I need to use this for (reading, arts & crafts - detailed close-up work, etc.). It has an added small high-magnification glass on the handle for an ultimate close-up view when you need it. The handle is really comfortable, and the weight of the magnifier is not too heavy, so when you need to use it for long periods of time, your wrist does not get tired. I use this magnifier FREQUENTLY; am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GrizzyLyn Hood

customer_reviews.title: Improves vision for Macualr degeneration
customer_reviews.text: My 96 year old uncle is thrilled with this product. He appreciates the light and magnification. “I can see clearly!!” Runs on AAA batteries. Dual lenses are extremely well placed. High magnification in the handle is a great design and easy to transition. The wider fuels lens is sharp and both have excellent optics. Thankyou for such a fine and affordable product. You have made someone’s life better.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A.

customer_reviews.title: Helps with reading those disclaimers!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps with reading labels on small products, like tins, or herbal containers. I did not install the batteries for the light from the outset. Pros Strong plastic Price Point Lights - helps highlighting small words even more Cons Does not come with batteries for the reading light requires 3 batteries for light to function
customer_reviews.author: LinkedInSecrets - Author of 4 LinkedIn Books

customer_reviews.title: Recommended essential
customer_reviews.text: Well made very nice unit it helps for people like me who dont like reading glasses or don't look good in reading glasses like myself so therefore I refuse to wear glasses. I use this for fine and small print reading this is my reading glasses! I don't need glasses to drive or see far away so this unit works perfect for me. thank you very much Amazon for having helpful instruments like this.
customer_reviews.author: by Z rater

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The magnifier is fine, but the light didn't work so that was disappointing to receive it like that.. Rather than deal with the hassle of returning it, I kept it for use of the magnifier without the light.
customer_reviews.author: Paradiseshopper

customer_reviews.title: My age is showing with my poor eyesight. I keep this in my purse to ...
customer_reviews.text: My age is showing with my poor eyesight. I keep this in my purse to read any and all fine print. I attend a lot of presentations and workshops where they distribute PowerPoint handouts that have miniscule fonts -- this is a much to read the fine print. The light is helpful also.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: This is really great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for the price. I've used it to identify which pills I''m using. I have to take quite a few and sometimes I get them mixed up as I'm sorting them for the week. Even tho they may be white and the same size they have different numbers engraved that are hard to see but the light on the glass helps a lot. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: joanbari

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and exactly as advertised. I especially like the light on handle which is very convenient. I had to buy another one. One for home and one I put in my drawer at the office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will and optical quality if good enough.
customer_reviews.text: Optical quality is good to very good. Lights make it very handy. The 20X has a very short eye relief, but I guess any 20X is going to. The lights spill enough light over to the 20X to be usefull. I keep asking my self way I didn’t one of these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: craig smith

customer_reviews.title: seeing well enough into the battery compartment to reattach the spring to the metal is pretty much a catch-22
customer_reviews.text: One of the negative battery terminal springs was loose and rattling around in the battery compartment (it takes three AAA batteries). For people who need one of these, seeing well enough into the battery compartment to reattach the spring to the metal is pretty much a catch-22. Man-sized fingers don't make it any easier. For the manufacturer, I would recommend a strong solder to attach those terminal springs to the metal. I didn't order a replacement, figuring that even if the springs were attached to the metal, it would only be a matter of time before one of them came loose when changing batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Alex J Lundberg

customer_reviews.title: Now You See It!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a beast! Now I can read that minuscule writing that they seem to put on every type of product now. It's not just my eyes...I ask my younger sons to read and they struggle, as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Adams

customer_reviews.title: An OK buy for the price. However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: An OK buy for the price. However, the on/off button malfunctions - hard to turn if off once on. Also, turns on by itself which is rather aggravating since it takes 3 batteries- which ran down the first week since it turned ON by itself in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Viki

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time an Amazon product has impressed me enough to write a review. For the price -- and in general -- this is a well-made, sleek, simple, and powerful little tool. Extremely happy with my purchase, and anyone who works with with small appliances (I work with computers) will not regretting grabbing one of these.
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: Extra sight for my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was expecting. It is very useful as my eye sight declines and I can't read fine print on packaging even with my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Bigger and Better Lit Print -
customer_reviews.text: Handy to keep around to read the small print on labels, etc. The light is helpful too. It does exactly what it is supposed to do. Help you read the small print. Lightweight and I just leave it out to use. Do not know yet about battery life - but I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep around for when labels are a bit hard to read (definitely the label's fault - not my getting older eyes). I use it more than I imagined! The light is bright and very useful. Probably should buy one for each floor of the house...
customer_reviews.author: Kristinaki

customer_reviews.title: light is a nice feature. helped when trying to read the gauge ...
customer_reviews.text: does as expected. light is a nice feature. helped when trying to read the gauge types written in small or non-existent font on wires in a not so well lot wiring closet.
customer_reviews.author: bjackfly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS MAGNIFYING GLASS!
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much, I took the time to write a review! It's the perfect size, not too small. The light is brilliant! Not everything expands on my iPad mini, so this comes in handy. I use it more than I ever thought I would. Tiny writng on packages... .No longer a problem. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Home Zoo

customer_reviews.title: Have several. Not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Good light. Both lenses are very useful. Glad it doesn't take "special" batteries. The switch on one is a little balky after only a short period of time so durability may become an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Meh.  Lights not positioned optimally.
customer_reviews.text: This is decent. The main problem is that the lights are not directed at the area under the magnifier. They seem to be pointed straight down. So it does help a little with illumination, but not as much as it could.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Washington

customer_reviews.title: Great Magnifier!
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is great! It's diameter is large enough to read a paragraph in the newspaper and the light is helpful. I may buy an additional one to keep in another area of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula H. Medanich

customer_reviews.title: works great! gifted one & recipient very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. works great! gifted one & recipient very pleased. Lighted and bright great magnification. quick delivery and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Va Sorrell

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for work!!! the light is great to have on it too. I've ordered him a 2nd one to have at home too.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: my vision isn't as good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. My husband loves his and both work really well. I do wish I would have gotten the 5X, my vision isn't as good.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Koller

customer_reviews.title: It's a good thing they're not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered about six of these lights. One has malfunction. I'll have to replace it. It's a good thing they're not too expensive. Other than the one malfunctioning the rest are great!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, looks cool, the light really helps, good quality, good magnification, and it was inexpensive, what else do you need to know?
customer_reviews.author: Rando

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a sturdy device. We have used this to help get splinters out many times now. The light is a big help for that. It also comes in handy for package inserts that are in such tiny fonts that they can't be read without some help. Intentional? Probably! We'll find many uses for this magnifier.
customer_reviews.author: Designer MomTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a great magnifying glass. It is a nice size lens, a nice full handle to grip and the led lights are very bright. Worked like a charm and no issues with the button like other claims. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D

customer_reviews.title: Super!
customer_reviews.text: The light and the magnifier are awesome! I bought it to use with old family photos. I wear my grandmother's wedding ring and with the more powerful magnifier I can see the ring on her finger 80 years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnifies 2X
customer_reviews.text: The max enlarges is about 2X. Amazon's 5 star reviews are not trustable any more. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present and it works great , battery life is short though.
customer_reviews.author: Rez

customer_reviews.title: Where Has This Item Been All My Life?
customer_reviews.text: I love this item - I use it every day. Have bought several for relatives and they can't imagine doing without them now. The high powered one in the middle doesn't fit my needs - but the larger lighted magnifier helps me with so many thing like medicine bottles, expiration dates on food items, ingredient list, adjusting jewelry, recipes, etc. Takes 3 triple A batteries - but really shines a nice light on whatever you are attempting to make larger.
customer_reviews.author: elaine in florida

customer_reviews.title: I recommend that no one purchase this Friday
customer_reviews.text: If I could rapist from a scale of 1 to 10 as 10 being awesome this product received a zero I'm a visually impaired person looking for visual aids and this magnifying glass doesn't offer it at all the light went out on it after 3 days and I've replaced battery but still doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: zelda

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me and even with reading glasses on, we still need a little help, this is a great product. This is actually my second one because my sister also loved it and told me she stole it from me. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous One

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my mom who couldn't see her Caller ID any longer. She loves it. Admittedly,I bought one for myself because I finally admitted that I just can't see basic text like I used to. Cheater glasses and magnifying glasses are my new friends.
customer_reviews.author: 4caninesandacat

customer_reviews.title: Eye saver
customer_reviews.text: I can't see very clearly upon awakening but I like to begin devotions before I get out of bed. This is truly a blessing. Over the counter medications are hard to read and this glass is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld magnifier with nice, bright lights.
customer_reviews.text: Much better magnifier than my old one. It has a comfortable handle and good magnification options. The LED lights are nice and bright. The price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherperson

customer_reviews.title: I CAN SEE THE LIGHT!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great but smaller than I expected. I've got to make it a point to look at the dimensions before buying!!! It's good for seeing labels on prescriptions or instructions on food, NOT GOOD FOR reading a book.
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Magnifier with Light and Super Magnification Component
customer_reviews.text: This magnifier is very well made, and its quality surpasses many magnifiers I've had. The super-magnifier component is microscopic, and you won't believe the detail you get that's also illuminated. I highly recommend this tool. Superb!
customer_reviews.author: Wise Mind

customer_reviews.title: Nice light
customer_reviews.text: My only negative comment is the actual glass is too small - I wish I had questioned the size before I paid - it's still a good glass just small - boo.
customer_reviews.author: NELLEHEART

customer_reviews.title: Three Cheers for Magnication
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the purchase. I've needed a good magnifying glass for some time, don't know what took me so long. The quality of the product is excellent. The light feature is especially convenient and appreciated. There are times,even with a high level of magnification it can still be hard to see something well,print can be so tiny these days.
customer_reviews.author: Linny

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Magnifying Glass
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday and not just to magnify. When I need a flashlight this is usually close at hand and it lights my way. Because of the light and sleek design that fits perfect in your hand It mskes it the perfect magnifying glass.
customer_reviews.author: CincyCheryl

customer_reviews.title: This magnifier is OK.
customer_reviews.text: Light flickers sometimes, and it feels cheaply made. 45X eyepiece is useless. BUT, I still use it for a quick glance at something, but not for hours at a time...... I give it an OK rating for the price, ya get what ya pay for. It's what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: LT1234455666

customer_reviews.title: Perfect magnifier and light for my elderly father to read ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect magnifier and light for my elderly father to read the paper and mail! He said he can see everything now, when before he always had issues. Arrived as promised and described!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Great magnifying glass
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Has a good quality feel in the hand. It’s really nice for older eyes. The loop magnifying glass in the handle is a nice touch for getting a real close view of jewelry, coins, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller magnifier with no light, this works better. Lately the instruction sheets that come with products are so small that the type is no longer readable to me. This helps.
customer_reviews.author: H. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, just what I wanted. Wish it had come with some type of protective sleeve other than the bubble wrap it was packed in. Suggest storing it in a sock or glove or similar to keep the lens from getting scratched.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father. LED light great and large handle makes it easy to hold. Great value. No distortion.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my Mom, who has begun to lose her perfect sight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my 95 year-old mother, who has begun to lose her perfect sight. This has been a godsend for her, as it allows her to continue to read.
customer_reviews.author: jeffreyh51

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: Who, for the love of pete, puts such teeny tiny writing on labels and ingredients? Until i can find that jerk and knuckle pop them in the eye, i will use this eye ball saving, migraine reducing, lighted awesomeness.
customer_reviews.author: #1Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Magnifier 3 LED Light, Marrywindix 3X 45X Handheld Magnifier Reading Magnifying Glass Lens Jewelry Loupe White and Black
feature_bullets: 3X(large lens) 45X(small lens) Independent lighting design, 2 LEDs for the large lens and 1 LED for the small one, ensure better lighting effect.
Switch to turn lights on and off, Great for reading, circuits, jewellery evaluating, and etc
Comfortable ergonomic handle; Magnification: large glass: 3X, small magnifier: 45X
Lens size: diameter 75mmx18mm/2.9''x0.7''； Handle length: approx. 11cm/4.3''
Compact and stylish design, portable light weight
